reasoning.correctness: The Generated Answer incorrectly asserts multiple times that the transcript lacks information on symptom chronology (e.g., cough first), durations (cough 4-5 days [P-2,P-4], runny nose couple days [P-11]), severity changes (stayed the same [P-7]), and prior history (never had dry cough like this, past runny noses shorter [P-24]), which directly contradicts the Gold Answer and explicit transcript evidence, representing mostly incorrect content with contradictions.
reasoning.completeness: Gold Answer key points: cough onset 4-5 days prior as first symptom [P-2,P-4]; dry/non-productive [P-5,P-6]; severity unchanged [P-7]; runny nose later (couple days) with clear discharge [P-11,P-12]; novel dry cough, prior runny noses shorter [P-24]. Generated Answer covers 0% of these, instead denying their presence.

summary: The Generated Answer fails severely on correctness, completeness, and faithfulness by hallucinating the absence of explicit transcript details on symptom progression, while remaining highly relevant in its structure.
